theAdventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theAdventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theAdventurer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theAdventurer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theAdventurer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theAdventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theAdventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theAdventurer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theAdventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theAdventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theAdventurer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
